title: A Small Slice of Summer
description: Letitia Marsden had decided that men were not to be trusted. Then she met Dr. Jason Mourik van Nie, and he changed her mind.Learning to trust again wasn't easy for either of them. This time, Letitia vowed, there would be a happy ending. But then Jason got the wrong idea about one of her male friendsâ€¦.Could a chance meeting set it right? Surely fate wasn't going to let a simple misapprehension stand in the way of true love?
author: Betty Neels
